Name: trucking-pricing-editor
Label: Trucking Pricing Editor

Components.Label: Type
Port of Discharge
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: Port of Loading
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: Carrier
Components.Query: {     "sql": "select * from Partner as ds where ServiceId = 3 and ActionId = 1 and IsNoDebt = 0",     "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from Partner as ds  where ServiceId = 3 and ActionId = 1 and IsNoDebt = 0" }

Components.Label: Provider
Create Quote
Components.Query:
select DefaultFee.*,FeeType.Description as FeeType,FeeType.IsFreight,FeeType.GroupName as GroupFee,MasterData.Name as UnitName
from DefaultFee
left join FeeType on DefaultFee.DescriptionId = FeeType.Id
left join MasterData on DefaultFee.UnitId = MasterData.Id
where InquiryDetailId in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
order by DefaultFee.UnitId asc

select Pricing.*
from InquiryDetail
left join Pricing on InquiryDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
where InquiryDetail.Id in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')

Components.Label: Commodity
PK Empty CTNR
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: Creator
Returns CTNR
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: DefaultFee

GridPolicies.Label: Unit Price
Description

Currency

Unit

Components.Label: Create Quote
Components.Query:
select DefaultFee.*,FeeType.Description as FeeType,FeeType.IsFreight,FeeType.GroupName as GroupFee,MasterData.Name as UnitName
from DefaultFee
left join FeeType on DefaultFee.DescriptionId = FeeType.Id
left join MasterData on DefaultFee.UnitId = MasterData.Id
where InquiryDetailId in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
order by DefaultFee.UnitId asc

select Pricing.*
from InquiryDetail
left join Pricing on InquiryDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
where InquiryDetail.Id in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
